name: Zombie Attack - Sniper Shoot
description:
Zombie Attack is a shooting and surviving game, featured in RPG and action gameplay. Grab your weapon, be a zombie killer and sniper!

Zombies squad are tilting and running to you. Stay calm, prepare your strong weapons, wear your best equipment, take royal robots along with you. Fire, shoot, kill zombies! No mercy, just courage and strength.

Tips: remember to upgrade your arms to improve your attributes.

Game Features:
- 3 game modes: Campaign Mode & Search Mode & Hunter Mode
- Custom-designed robots: Spider Armor, Crazy boy...
- Various zombies and big boss await you
- Numerous types of weapons: rifle, electromagnetic guns, flame grenade

Fight the battle, defend your city, save your citizens. Zombie Crisis come, time to battle!
